extendedInfo.description: AUTO SPEAK CLIPBOARDThis program will give you the ability to have the android device speak out the contents of the clip board using the Text-to-Speech (TTS) engine. The speech will automatically begin whenever you copy text to the clipboard from any application.No special Android permissions are needed with this application (no ads). If you like this app, please rate it or review it or both.TODO- add better iconsKnown Bugs- Text copied from the Chrome browser will speak twice.

reviews.title: Elegantly simple
reviews.comment: I wanted to be able to read aloud textual content that I\'m working on when I\'m reviewing my work. This provides a really simple way to selectively do so. I installed Ivona TTS, since the engine that comes with my Nexus 7 doesn\'t seem to work with this app. I like that the basic user interface allows you to turn clipboard reading on and off, because I wouldn\'t want this happening all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple application.
reviews.comment: Exactly what I have been looking for. No extra interface or settings. Just on or off. Thank you. Galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cuz\'n Vinni
reviews.comment: Liked it well then it stopped working on my HTC Sensation. If it works on your phone its great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you very much
reviews.comment: Greater application for free. Found exactly what I need. Why two versions. Please use a nice icon. If you want I would like to design one for you.
reviews.author: Prasath Mendis Appu
